scripts.cdk-diff-dev: cdk context --clear && cdk diff $npm_config_stack -c config=dev --profile default
scripts.cdk-diff-dev-all: cdk context --clear && cdk diff -c config=dev --profile default
scripts.cdk-deploy-dev: cdk context --clear && cdk deploy $npm_config_stack -c config=dev --profile default
scripts.cdk-diff-prod: cdk context --clear && cdk diff $npm_config_stack -c config=prod --profile piksel-del3-prod
scripts.cdk-diff-prod-all: cdk context --clear && cdk diff -c config=prod --profile piksel-del3-prod
scripts.cdk-deploy-prod: cdk context --clear && cdk deploy $npm_config_stack -c config=prod --profile piksel-del3-prod
